About App

Ask   Assist   Attain

SamePinch is created by idealists who believe in new era of social networking where people(dots, we say) connect with like minded people via common interests.
Imagine a virtual wall where you can post anything you like (even as anonymous) and community is watching, learning and commenting.

Features

Posts

Ask something. Share something. Be a micro-blogger!

as anonymous

Unleash yourself being Anonymous while posting/commenting.

Tags

Dots connect via common interests/tags.

Star

Follow a person, post, tag.
